Articles.Content:
Did, but didn't go to plan.

TUBM in melancholy.

No. Im livid. I refuse you stealing my plan.

TUBM agrees i waited too long to let my plan be stolen

044308192023

No, you got impatient and posted early. I just made sure the pic you wanted to post was on the right number. It was done for you, so no talk of stolen please.

TUBM is calm.

No, not calm, agitated at the idea of failing my plan. while i appreciate the gesture, and i truly do, i waited 8 hours,  i couldnt let it go, i even tried to prompt anyone to make 5554 but after 8 hours it wasnt happening. The desire to be 5555 was sparked when i saw the loss of 5309 after watching for it then losing the chance because i needed food.

TUBM understands the feeling of needing it given the above

045808192023

050008192023
